Package src.recomanador.domini

Class ControladorDominiAlgorisme

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.recomanador.domini.ControladorDominiAlgorisme
  • public class ControladorDominiAlgorisme
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to call the algorithm and keep saved its parameters.

    • Field Detail

      • ALGORISME_SELECCIONAT

        int ALGORISME_SELECCIONAT
        Indicates which algorithm to use. Options are: 0 - collaborative filtering(Kmeans + Slope1) 1 - content-based filtering(KNN) 2 - hybrid approaches

      • K

        int K
        Value used in the Kmeans algorithm. Determines how many centroids are used.

      • Q

        int Q
        How many items to be recommended

      • seleccionar_algorisme

        public void seleccionar_algorisme​(int a)
                           throws src.recomanador.excepcions.DataNotValidException
        Sets the attributre ALGORISME_SELECCIONAT of the active instance
        Parameters:
        a - an integer representing which recommendation algorithm should be ran. 0 represents collaborative filtering usking k-means+Slope-1, 1 represents content based filtering using k-Nearest-Neighbours and 2 represents hybrid approaches
        Throws:
        src.recomanador.excepcions.DataNotValidException

      • run_algorithm

        public java.util.ArrayList<ItemValoracioEstimada> run_algorithm​(int user_ID,
                                                                ConjuntItems items,
                                                                ConjuntUsuaris usuaris,
                                                                ConjuntRecomanacions valoracions)
                                                         throws src.recomanador.excepcions.UserNotFoundException
        Runs the selected recommendation algorithm.
        Parameters:
        user_ID - user whose recommendations will be generated
        items - ConjuntItems from which the ratings will be generated
        usuaris - ConjuntUsuaris which will help generate the ratings on Collaborative Filtering
        valoracions - ConjuntRecomanacions which contain the ratings from which we will base our new ratings.
        Throws:
        src.recomanador.excepcions.UserNotFoundException
